title: Account/Login Problem
complaint_description: Customer cannot access their account; receives error: Invalid credentials.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Offer temporary access link valid for 1 hour while we troubleshoot.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #2290. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
